constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 12 (Thursday, January 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SABLAN:
H.R. 421.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution.
[Page H225]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations.

sponsors.fullName: Del. Sablan, Gregorio Kilili Camacho [D-MP-At Large]

title: Assuring You Uniform Dietary Assistance (AYUDA) Act of 2021
